MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Win98,WinME,Windows2000,WinXP,Windows2003,Windows Vista Starter,Windows Vista Home Basic,Windows Vista Home Premium,Windows Vista Business,Windows Vista Enterprise,Windows Vista Ultimate,Windows Vista Home Basic x64,Windows Vista Home Premium x64,Windows Vista Business x64,Windows Vista Enterprise x64,Windows Vista Ultimate x64, Linux

English.Char_Desc_45: C# class library for manipating vCards.
English.Char_Desc_80: C# class library for manipulating vCard contact information files. Open source.
English.Char_Desc_250: C# class library for manipulating vCard contact information files. Free and open souce. Provides full object-oriented access to vCard information, including security certificates, phones, postal address and more.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: This class library is an open source library distributed under the terms of the LGPL. Please refer to LICENSE.TXT in the ZIP file for a copy of the LGPL or for information on obtaining a private license that may be better suited for your particular needs.
